channel.title: ChatGPT on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in ChatGPT on Mark Needham

item.title: Arc Browser: Building a plugin (Boost) with help from ChatGPT
item.description: I’ve been using the Arc Browser for a couple of months now and one of my favourite things is the simplicity of the plugin (or as they call it, 'Boost') functionality. I wanted to port over a Chrome bookmark that I use to capture the podcasts that I’ve listened to on Player.FM. In this blog post I’ll show how ChatGPT helped me convert the bookmark code to an Arc Boost.
